tech_news.title: Google’s NotebookLM adds ‘Deep Research’ tool, support for more file types - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The service is rolling out "Deep Research," a tool that will automate and simplify complex online research.

tech_news.title: TikTok launches its own version of Instagram’s broadcast channels - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: TikTok is rolling out “bulletin board,” a new one-to-many messaging feature that mirrors Instagram’s broadcast channels. The tool lets creators and brands share text, images, and videos directly with followers.

tech_news.title: The OnePlus 15 will go on sale in the US… sometime - The Verge
tech_news.description: OnePlus is ready to launch its latest flagship in the US, but the government shutdown is holding up its final FCC certifications.
